p: Recruitment began in March 2016 and continued through May 2017. Participants were followed up for 12 months. Any ART client who accessed care in the study clinics during the recruitment period was approached for participation (eTable 1 in Supplement 2). Once saturation was reached (ie, the study team did not identify any new potential participants for at least 1 week), we moved to recruitment in the next clinic, using a random ordering of clinics. HIV clinicians introduced the study to patients and referred them to study staff if interested, at which time eligibility was assessed and written informed consent was obtained. Viral load was not assessed prior to enrollment.
